name: Ritt
description:
Ritt

Ritt is a Godot Engine game prototype project where you control a character who attacks depending on certain beats of the background music. The sole purpose of making this prototype was to learn how to make a character react to the beat in the music.

Caution

This game has been prototyped in a game jam in 48 hours and is discontinued now. Ritt will become a complete game some other time!

Controls

The only controls you need to test Ritt are W, A, S & D. You can also use a gamepad for movement.

Usage

This is a game prototype project which was made during a game jam. You can freely check the source code of the project and make experiments with it.
